duties_responsibilities.duty: Promote re-distribution and wholesale sales for the mobility division, focusing on smartphones, tablets, wearables, and hearables.
Build and manage relationships with companies purchasing used electronics in bulk volumes.
Proactively promote volume sales into channels and match inventory with appropriate customer demand.
Perform Lead Generation & Prospecting, Sales, and Sales Support activities.
Coordinate with the production team for proper order fulfillment.

education_certification.credential: Prior experience in selling used/refurbished electronics, particularly Smartphones.
Comfortable selling into diverse global markets and understanding market intricacies.
